title: *Modern 2-Bedroom Apartment in a Luxury Amenities Building* 1627 3B
posting_body: ["*I Can Show You ALL the Available Units in This Building And ALL of Rentopia's Properties ||", 'NO BROKER FEE*', 'We have a great relationship with this landlord and we are the best point of contact for this building', '*Modern 2-Bedroom Apartment in a Luxury Amenities Building*', 'The pictures are for illustration purposes only - the unit is similar to the pictures in the listing', '*SEPTEMBER 1ST MOVE-IN*', '*The Building Features:*', 'Gym / Lounge & Game Room / Laundry Room / Bike Racks /', '*The Apartment Features:*', '2 Full-Size Bedrooms / Both Bedrooms Have Small *Balconies* / Floor-to-Ceilings Windows / Lots of Direct Natural Light / Boxed Living Space that Can Accommodate Living Room Furniture & a small Dining Table / Bathroom with a Deep Soaking Tub / AC Unit in Each Room / L-Shaped Kitchen with Stainless Steel Appliances including a Dishwasher & Built-in Microwave / High Ceilings / Hardwood Floors / Video Intercom /', 'A Step Away from the C Train at Kingston-Throop Station /', 'A Short walk to the A Train at Utica Ave Station /', 'Around the Corner from a Big Supermarket, Shops, & a Large Playground /', '*Good credit history 700+ and a combined annual income of $129,000+ (=40x times the monthly rent) are required / Personal guarantors are welcome! /', '"Insurent" is accepted on a case by case basis*']
